=======
History
=======

0.1.0 (2018-11-02)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.

0.2.0 (2018-11-13)
------------------

* Major feature implementation and documentation
* Static typing
* Testing - 78% coverage


0.3.0 (2018-11-20)
------------------

* Major internals refactoring
* API unchanged, although external API was made more clear and documented
